title: Mastery sets not applying? Weird error message as well?
body:
So, I recently re-did my masteries and now when i go to play a game, its like my masteries are all blank (no keystone). I have checked numerous times to make sure I saved the mastery sets before exiting out of the menu. 

Also, when I go to my masteries tab to do anything mastery related an error message occurs. "An unexpected error occured, We've sent a report to the server, sorry about that" 

Anyone know where I should go or the solution to my problem?

replies.body: problem has been resolved. I redownloaded or patched my files or w/e in the log in screen and it mustve been a jank file. I did however go and take the parenthesis out of the names because it was useless and who knows mabe it was a problem. either way im happy.

I went ahead and took a look at your masteries and it appears that you have two different names that include parenthesis as a special character.  Given that the client still considered this a special character, it may be affecting how it is properly saving them.  Try deleting the parenthesis and see if it helps to resolve the issue.

Reply back and let me know if it still persists!
